choices.text:
write a python function to read from an excel spreadsheet.
Sure, here's an example Python function that uses the pandas library to read data from an Excel file and return it as a DataFrame:
```python
import pandas as pd
def read_excel(file_path):
    df = pd.read_excel(file_path)
    return df
```
To use this function, you would call it with the path to your Excel file as an argument, like so:
```python
df = read_excel('my_file.xlsx')
print(df)
``` 
This will print the contents of the DataFrame returned by the function. You can then use pandas functions and methods to manipulate or analyze the data as needed.
